sentences.sContent: The experts agreed that a face-to-face talk might be a good idea .
sentences.sContent_eng: The experts agreed that a face-to-face talk might be a good idea .
sentences.sCn: 专家们一致同意，举行一次面对面的会谈也许是一个好主意。

sentences.sContent: The scene was set for a face-to-face confrontation between defiant Jews and the man behind the Final Solution.
sentences.sContent_eng: The scene was set for a face-to-face confrontation between defiant Jews and the man behind the Final Solution.
sentences.sCn: 于是演出便成了无畏的犹太人与操纵灭绝犹太人计划者之间的一场面对面的对抗。

sentences.sContent: The most efficient and effective method of conveying information to and within a development team is face-to-face conversation.
sentences.sContent_eng: The most efficient and effective method of conveying information to and within a development team is face-to-face conversation.
sentences.sCn: 向开发团队及在开发团队中传达信息的最有效率和最有效的方法是：面对面的交谈。
